QuestData.Title: Spiking the Mix
QuestData.Description: I've a feeling the long trip across the sea is affecting the effectiveness of our plague. What is needed is a potent toxin to boost the potency of the strain.$B$BThe crabs near this beach are a distant relative of the much smaller brown-shelled tidecrawler. The smaller tropical variety produces a paralytic toxin strong enough to knock out an ogre.$B$BAs we all know bigger is better! The much larger glands on the local variety should prove more potent. Bring me a few!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 3 Giant Toxin Glands from Giant Tidecrawlers to Apothecary Lysander at Vengeance Landing in Howling Fjord.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you obtained the toxin glands I seek, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: You continue to prove your competence, $n. Hopefully this toxin will be enough to boost our plague to the levels that we need to.$B$BAt the very least it should help weaken the recipient and make them more susceptible to infection.
